TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuggestionManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Creates and retrieves a user's colleague and keyword suggestions.

remarks.para: This object can be retrieved by accessing the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.Suggestion Add (Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.SuggestionType type, string suggestion, double weight);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.Suggestion Add(valuetype Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.SuggestionType type, string suggestion, float64 weight) cil managed
public: Microsoft::Office::Server::UserProfiles::Suggestion ^ Add(Microsoft::Office::Server::UserProfiles::SuggestionType type, System::String ^ suggestion, double weight);

Docs.param: Either a keyword or the account name of a colleague.
Docs.summary: Adds a suggestion for the user with the specified type, string, and weight.

remarks.para: If the suggestion already exists, the weight will be updated. If the is Rejected, it will change to Suggested.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.Suggestion Add (Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.SuggestionType type, string suggestion, double weight, Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.SuggestionStatus status);

Docs.param: Either a keyword or the account name of a colleague.
Docs.summary: Adds a suggestion for the user with the specified type, string, weight, and status.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddMultiple(valuetype Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.SuggestionType type, valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, float64>[] suggestions) cil managed
Public Sub AddMultiple (type As SuggestionType, suggestions As KeyValuePair(Of String, Double)())
public: void AddMultiple(Microsoft::Office::Server::UserProfiles::SuggestionType type, cli::array <System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, double>> ^ suggestions);

Docs.summary: Adds multiple suggestions for the user with a single specified type and with the specified string and weights.

remarks.para: This method updates the weight of a suggestion if it already exists. If a suggestion's is Rejected, then the request is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteAllSuggested(valuetype Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.SuggestionType type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Deletes all suggestions by type. Does not delete rejections, since those should be preserved in case we try to suggest them again.

Public Function GetSuggestions (type As SuggestionType, status As SuggestionStatus) As Suggestion()

Docs.summary: Retrieves the user's suggestions with the specified type and status.
